name: CarN'Ice
description:
CarN'Ice or Car On Ice is a game made in 20 min, under Brackeys 10 min game challange. (I failed obviously). Its a very simple game, where you control a car, driving on ice. Try not to lose, i guess. The point is, its very simple. 

Its more like a prototype, though im very happy with the game feel. So there wil probably be a better folowup. There is no sound, but if you really want some, i reccomend this***

***
